name: Garten of Banban 3
storyline: The depths of the mysterious establishment that is Banban’s Kindergarten turned out to be much bigger than anyone could have thought, with many floors having been built underneath the seemingly innocent Kindergarten explored in the first game. With friends being present at every turn, you have no choice but to continue delving deeper into the place in hopes of finding your child.
summary: Embrace the horrors of Banban’s Kindergarten. Delve even deeper into the depths of the establishment that was left suspiciously empty. Try to survive the unexpected residents and continue the search for your child…
